item.title: How can i chnage the xp rate in training?
item.dc:creator: @Sivan Sivan
item.description:
@Sivan wrote:

go to client.java first check hit 1 then check how much xp you get then.

1: Go to client,java
2: Ctrl+F
3: put in the amount of xp.

then you will find something like this.

if (FightType == 1) { addSkillXP(700 * hitDiff, 0); } else if (FightType == 2 || FightType == 3) { addSkillXP(700 * hitDiff, 2); } else if (FightType == 4) { addSkillXP(700 * hitDiff, 1); } addSkillXP(700 * hitDiff, 3);

change the 700s to the amount of xp you wan’t to get each hit remember there are couple of more then edit them asswel.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i chnage the xp rate in training?
